'''''N-Thousand Leagues Under the Sea''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete ''[[The Still Water's Flow]].''

==Trivia==
* The name of the achievement is a reference to the book ''{{w|Twenty Thousand Leagues Under the Seas}}'' by {{w|Jules Verne}}.
